About

I've spent over a decade helping organisations around the world to create change. Currently I teach and practise change design from Sydney, Australia.

Fun facts

  • I'm a hyper-visual thinker. This means I constantly draw pictures and take notes on my iPad pro. It helps me learn, think and communicate clearly.
  • I help my wife Leilani raise our four children (she does most of the work).
  • Here's how to follow me online.

Past tense

  • Alumni of Inspire Group award winning, bespoke learning design agency in Wellington, NZ
  • Instructional designer and knowledge management specialist at Sitel the global leader in business process outsourcing
  • Freelance web designer
  • Mormon Missionary in the Australian Outback
